ComicInfo.Summary:
"Brief Lives" continues as Delirium of The Endless enlists her brother, The Sandman, in her quest to find their long-lost brother, Destruction. And much to the surprise of Morpheus's servants, their master agrees to walk the waking world in search of their prodigal sibling.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-08-06 16:32:00. [CVDB36249]
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/the-sandman-42-brief-lives-2-it-always-rains-on-th/4000-36249/
ComicInfo.Title: Brief Lives 2: It Always Rains on the Unloved - Wet Dreams - A Fishing Expedition - She Kisses Wyverns (The Disneyland Analogy) - Dinner Etiquette and Chocolate Lovers - Desire Swears by the First Circle - Things Are Changing - What Can Possibly Go Wrong?
